title: Smart Data models - Biology / Cell Counter"
description: A cell counter from images taken from a digital microscope.

focus.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Set the focus of the microscope, the range is between 0 and 1.

temperature.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The temperature of the device in celsius.

destinyURLWithLiquid.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. The url where the images taken after liquid with the microscope have to be send

destinyURLWithoutLiquid.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. The url where the images taken before liquid with the microscope have to be send

pathImageWithoutLiquid.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. The path where the image without liquid is saved.

pathImageWithLiquid.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. The path where the image with liquid is saved

zoom.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Change the zoom mode of the microscope. There are 2 zoom modes: {IN} and {OUT}. While zoomed in the resolution is higher but the ROI is smaller, zoomed out has a higher ROI but a lower resolution.

getImageWithLiquid.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Boolean'. The microscope will take and image everytime this value its updated in orion for count the number of live cells

getImageWithoutLiquid.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Boolean'. The microscope will take and image everytime this value its updated in orion for count the total number of cells

liveCells.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The number of live cells counted.

Cells.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The number of cells {death or alive} counted.

cellsViability.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Viability of the cells {{number of live cells/total number of cells}x100}.
